subject: COMPENSATION FUNDS PAYMENT ORD
body:
COMPENSATION FUNDS PAYMENT ORDER VIA ATM CARD
I'm Ms. Kristalina Georgieva, Managing Director INTERNATIONAL MONETARY
FUND (IMF} .It's my pleasure to inform you that we have been working
towards the eradication of fraudsters artists in the world with the
help of the African Union (AU) United Nations (UN) European Union (EU)
and we have been able to track down some artists in various parts of
the world and they are all in government custody now.
During the course of investigation, they were able to recovered some
funds from these scam artists and IMF organization have ordered
 the
funds recovered to be shared among the 50 Lucky people listed around
the World as a compensation. This notice is been directed to you
because your email address was found in one of the scam Artists file
and computer hard-disk while the investigation, maybe you have been
scammed.
 You are therefore being compensated with sum of $2,500 000.00
US Dollars.
Since your email address is among the lucky beneficiaries who will
receive a compensation funds,The United Nations/IMF has decided to
prefer a solution that will make it easier for all the Beneficiaries
to receive their Funds. We understood that some Fees are required in
order process and Transfer of your Funds into your Account. We are
also aware that most Beneficiaries do not have these required fees.
For that reason,We have concluded with the United Nations to Convert
your funds US$2.5 Million into ATM Card with the Pin Numbers as to
enable you withdrawal maximum of $5,000 on each withdrawal from any
Bank ATM Machine of your choice, until all the funds are exhausted
which we have successfully done and even ready to send to your address
after the STAMP DUTY CHARGE is paid by you which is US$50 only.
This method of payment is designed by the government to avert fraud
perpetration or stoppage of fund by some agencies either through anti
terrorist certificate or other certificates. The use of the ATM Cash
card is to by-pass the rigorous documentation that has resulted in the
delays and demands for obnoxious fees by corrupt officials of the
government and ensure that you receive you due payment expeditiously.
The ATM Card with Security Pin Numbers shall be delivered to you using
UPS courier Service Note: that you are to pay for the STAMP DUTY
CHARGE fee of US$50 only to UPS COURIER COMPANY for immediate
dispatch of your ATM Card to your address.
Department of INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND (IMF) has been mandated that
the ATM card with its security Pin Number shall be released to you,as
soon as you 
get back to me with your below information in order to
proceed with this delivery.
1.Full Names :
2.Residential Address :
3.Mobile Number:
4.Occupation :
5.Occupation :
6.Age :
7.Country :
The amount for STAMP DUTY CHARGE is just $50 and can be sent via, Stream Wallet or ITunes gift card
,We need you to make
the required payment so that delivery could be made to you as soon as
possible to your address.Get to any Walmart or any store buy either
the Stream Wallet Gift card or iTunes Gift card for the required
amount and send the gift details immediately so that we can authorize
UPS to move on with the delivery immediately you send the fee without
anymore delay.
Bear in mind that 
you have been given 48 hours to raise and send the
fees otherwise the delivery of the funds will be cancel immediately
and Also you are require to confirm the above information as we would
not be held responsible of wrong delivery
You will be provided with my work Identification as soon as you
confirm your readiness to proceed and make the required payment
Thanks for your understanding as you follow instructions while I wait
to hear from you today,
Yours Sincerely
Ms.Kristalina Georgieva
Managing
INTERNATIONAL MONETARY FUND (IMF)
E-mail : 
internationalmonitoringfundsx@gmail.com

subject: Re: COMPENSATION FUNDS PAYMENT ORD
body:
Hello Ms. Kristalina Georgieva,

Wow, this is such an unexpected surprise! I can't believe my email address was found in one of those files. It's really amazing that you're working so hard to stop these scam artists and even more so that you're sharing the recovered funds with people like me.

I'm a bit confused about some parts of your message though. Could you please explain how exactly the ATM card works? And why is there a need for a STAMP DUTY CHARGE? 

Also, could you tell me more about the UPS COURIER COMPANY? I've never heard of them before. Are they reliable?

Looking forward to hearing from you soon!

Best wishes,
William

subject: Re: COMPENSATION FUNDS PAYMENT ORD
body:
Dear Beneficiary.
We received your email and its content is well acknowledged. We thank you
so much for your relevant questions here. First of all, I will start from
your ATM card. When you receive your ATM card with its pin code, you can
take it to any nearest ATM machine around you or any part of the world to
make your maximum withdrawal at rate of $10,000.00 daily until you withdraw
all.

Secondly, the stamp duty will help your card  package not to be stopped by
custom department at any airport until it gets to your door step.

Thirdly, UPS COURIER EXPRESS DELIVERY COMPANY OR DHL COURIER EXPRESS
DELIVERY COMPANY are world wide and they have branches or corresponding
delivery company in every company around the word. They services does take
more than 72hours. So once you pay the required fee, it's thier duty to
deliver your ATM PACKAGE to your country and the delivery agent man will
bring it to your house address which you asked to provide here.
So kindly go and buy an apple gift of the price you required to pay and
send it here to enable you receive your card without further delays .
Thanks so much and remain blessed.

subject: Re: COMPENSATION FUNDS PAYMENT ORD
body:
Hello,

Thank you for your detailed response. It's really helpful to understand the process better. I'm quite excited about receiving my ATM card and being able to withdraw money at any ATM machine around the world.

I have a few more questions though, if you don't mind. You mentioned something about a stamp duty that will prevent my card package from being stopped by customs. Could you please explain a bit more about this? How does it work exactly?

Also, I'm not very familiar with UPS COURIER EXPRESS DELIVERY COMPANY OR DHL COURIER EXPRESS DELIVERY COMPANY. Could you tell me more about their services? How long does delivery usually take?

Lastly, regarding the apple gift, could you clarify what exactly this is and how I should go about purchasing one?

Thank you so much for your time and patience in answering my questions.

Best wishes,
William
